Description: Body sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery phiale mesomphalos; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black with part of lotus flower in added white outline with added red centres; exterior, slip worn: reserved at top, above band and glazed area.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1942) (phase 2)
